title: Yeni Hayat
overview: Serkan Çayoğlu will give life to the character Adem,a former military man. For various reasons, Adem is compelled to abandon military service and will begin a new civil life, engaging as a bodyguard. Yeni Hayat is an adaptation of the British series ,Bodyguard".Little Nice Sofyia Aksondur will give life to the character Ece,being adem's daughter.Melisa Aslı Pamuk will give life to yasemin.Tayanç Ayaydın will give life to the character İşadamı, yasemine'shusband, a businessman who has many enemies. He contacts Adem by offering him the job of bodyguard to protect his wife.Nepileri Şahinkaya will give life to nevin,being adem's wife.The show is based on the impossible love between Adem and Yasemin.
